channel.title: Posts on magarenzo.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on magarenzo.github.io

item.title: Migrating MySQL Database and Users
item.description: MySQL Version: 5.7 Linux Versions: RHEL 6 Ubuntu 14 I recently migrated a MySQL database from an old instance to a new one, and with that, all of the existing users with their passwords and grants. Being that I had to span multiple resources to gather all of the information I needed, I figured it would be helpful if all of these resources could be in the same place so that future users can have a simpler time looking to accomplish the same thing.

item.title: Welcome!
item.description: This is the beginnings of my website’s migration back to Hugo to start up my blog again. Hugo is “the world’s fastest framework for building websites”, which is great because I often (mercilessly) rebuild pages over and over again, even after the tiniest of changes, to confirm that I like the way they look. If you don’t know yet, my name is Michael A. Agarenzo, and I am a Software Engineer.
